acceptance-test-run.title: sending POST requests to HTTP service
acceptance-test-run.name: sending POST requests to HTTP service

test-group.name: When I send to HTTPService request with {aaaaa} and {bbbbb} and {custom data pampampam}
Prepare request to HTTP service: aaaaa, bbbbb, custom data pampampam

test-step.description: Send prepared POST request to HTTP service

test-group.name: Then response contains {aaaaa}, {bbbbb} and {custom data pampampam}

test-step.description: Should get response with parameters: aaaaa, bbbbb, custom data pampampam

test-group.name: [2] {parameter1=first param, parameter2=second param, data=this is data}
When I send to HTTPService request with {first param} and {second param} and {this is data}
Prepare request to HTTP service: first param, second param, this is data

test-step.description: Send prepared POST request to HTTP service

test-group.name: Then response contains {first param}, {second param} and {this is data}

test-step.description: Should get response with parameters: first param, second param, this is data
